_source.title: Sigma: Detect Persistence Of Grandoreiro Banking Trojan via registry_event)
_source.description: Attackers provide fluency to execute the trojan every time the computer restarts. With this rule, you can detect the change made to the registry. Author: TestMT. Rule ID: 00a7fb08-7aed-41ce-8f69-c97127584b0a License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md. Reference: https://tdm.socprime.com/tdm/info/LciIloHyE2Ci.
